

# CARREGANDO O PACOTE
```{r}

library(lattice)

```



# BOXPLOT
```{r}

trees

bwplot(x = trees$Volume)

bwplot(x = trees$Volume,
       main = "Arvores",
       xlab = "Volume")

```



# HISTOGRAMA
```{r}

#type = percent, count, density


histogram(x = trees$Volume,
          xlab = "Volume",
          ylab = "Frequencia",
          nint = 10,
          type = "count")

```
